scripts.copy-assets: echo "copying Design System assets into /assets folder" && rm -rf assets && mkdir assets && copyfiles -u 4 node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/assets/**/** assets
scripts.create-sass: echo "building CSS file from Design System and adding any local CSS" && rm -rf assets/stylesheet && sass src/assets/stylesheet/styles.scss assets/stylesheet/application.css
scripts.create-js: echo "creating JavaScript" && rm -rf assets/javascript && copyfiles -u 2 src/assets/javascript/**/** assets
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run create-js && npm run create-sass && nodemon app/index.js
